On 2002-09-23 at 04:33 Singh Manpreet wrote:

>This is a sort of newbie question, could anyone please
>explain me how i can write a testcase for a method
>which is reading data from a file.

Hello, Manpreet.

How do you know whether your method works? What would you do to verify
for yourself that the method reads the data correctly? Explain that in
words and we can convert it to code.
